message: Let's split the money evenly. This way, we ensure fairness and avoid any potential conflict.
I'm willing to give you a smaller share, but I think this is a fair compromise given the initial offer was too generous.
I propose an equal division of the remaining funds. This maintains fairness and ensures both of us receive an equitable share.
I'm not willing to give up the majority of the remaining funds. I think this is a more reasonable compromise.
I believe this division provides a balanced approach, with a slight advantage for Bob. It respects the principle of fairness while acknowledging the diminishing value of money over time.
